item.title: Video Editor - Bali - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled and reliable video editor based in Bali who can assist our team with a specific project. The primary task involves meeting with one of our team members in Bali, collecting a microSD card containing raw video footage, editing and compiling these videos into one cohesive file, and then uploading the final high-quality 4K video (100+ GB) to our designated server.

**Responsibilities:**

- **Meet with Team Member:** Coordinate and meet with our team member in Bali to collect the microSD card with the video footage.
- **Video Editing:** Edit and compile all video clips into one cohesive 4K video file.
- **File Upload:** Ensure the final video file (100+ GB) is uploaded to our given server in high quality.
- **Future Tasks:** Depending on performance and availability, additional creative tasks related to video production and editing may be assigned.

**Requirements:**

- **Location:** Must be based in Bali, Indonesia.
- **Experience:** Proven experience in video editing, particularly with 4K footage.
- **Software Proficiency:** Expertise in using video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar.
- **Technical Skills:** Ability to handle large video files and ensure high-quality output.
- **Reliability:** Must be punctual and reliable in meeting deadlines and coordinating with team members.
- **Communication:** Strong communication skills to effectively liaise with our team.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 15, 2024 13:10 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Intro & Outro, Video Commercial, Concept Video, Footage-Based Video, Video Editing
Skills: Video Intro & Outro, Video Commercial, Concept Video, Footage-Based Video, Video Editing
Country: Lithuania
click to apply

item.title: Looking for Intermediate Level Reels Editor (Full Time) - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a highly skilled Reels and Social Media Clips Editor to join our agency. The ideal candidate will be proficient in Premiere Pro and After Effects, with a proven track record of creating engaging short-form content for social media platforms. As much of our clientele is international, proficiency in English is essential. We are looking for a quick learner and self-starter with a strong creative flair.
This role is not suitable for beginners; we require someone with a depth of experience and a portfolio that demonstrates their expertise in video editing and motion graphics.

Responsibilities:

- Edit and produce 15-20 high-quality reels and social media clips per week.
- Collaborate with the creative team to develop concepts and storyboards.
- Ensure all videos align with the brand's tone and style.
- Stay updated on industry trends and best practices for video editing and motion graphics.
- Participate in brainstorming sessions and contribute creative ideas.
- Meet deadlines and deliver projects according to specifications.

Requirements:

- Proficiency in Adobe Premiere Pro and After Effects.
- Strong command of the English language.
- Demonstrated experience in creating social media videos.
- Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
- Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
- Creative thinker with a keen eye for detail.

Selection Process:

- Candidates will undergo a mandatory skill test to assess proficiency in Premiere Pro and After Effects.
- Shortlisted candidates will be invited to participate in a video interview to discuss their experience and creative approach.

Benefits:

- Flexible hours and remote work opportunities.
- Opportunities for growth and advancement within the company.
- Include the word "grind" as the first word of your application to be considered.
- Comprehensive training and upskilling during a 3-week probationary period.
- Exposure to diverse projects and clients from around the world.

If you meet the qualifications and are passionate about creating compelling visual content, we'd love to hear from you. Please submit your portfolio and resume for consideration.

Budget: $250
Posted On: June 15, 2024 13:04 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Audio Editing, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Audio Editing, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: Looking for Video editor for Space and Cosmos Realted YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a video editor who can do the following:
- Find relevant footage or pictures for the video
- Add effects such as transitions, lower thirds and overlays at the start of videos
- Make an engaging video

To provide a clear idea of the type of content we aim to produce, please take a moment to view the following examples:

https://www.youtube.com/@SpacedustDOC/videos
https://www.youtube.com/@KosmoDOC/videos
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=13expQNZN7E
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2-Gdv0BO-oI

We kindly request that you watch a few videos on the sample channels to grasp the specific style of video editing we're seeking.

The videos will be around 1.5 hours (90 minutes) long.

Payment: $90 per video
We are looking for someone who is communicative, responsive, and understands what makes a video enjoyable to watch.

In your proposal include:
- your portfolio/previous work
- how many videos you think you'd be able to make
- any other relevant previous work

Budget: $90
Posted On: June 15, 2024 13:02 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Explainer Videos (Those New To Upwork Welcome) - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for someone to produce explainer  videos and videos as part of a video course.
The visuals will mainly be still images, video clips and animated images and text on the screen.
You will be provided with

-The audio for the videos
   -All the video clips and images required for the videos
Music
-Instructions on what is to go where

Your job will be to put it all together to create the videos required. We are open to any artistic changes you may wish to make to improve on it.

The job is split into two parts

**Part 1**

2 videos

Video 1: Approx 16 mins
Video 2: Approx 5 mins

**Part 2**

5 videos  totaling approx 45 minutes

The deadline will be 7 days to complete the videos from the time you are instructed

If you feel you can do the job can you please respond providing the following

1.Provide a quote for job part 1
2.Provide a separate quote for job part 2
3.Explain briefly why you are able to do the job
4.Confirm that you can meet the deadline
5.Provide us with a link to any similar work that you have done

Please be aware that the budget is limited for these jobs and therefore if you charges are high then it is unlikely that we will go with you. This job is suited for someone new to Upwork looking to build his portfolio or someone who is started their career in this area.


Posted On: June 15, 2024 12:52 UTC
Category: 2D Animation
Skills:2D Animation, Explainer Video, Whiteboard Animation, Video Editing
Skills: 2D Animation, Explainer Video, Whiteboard Animation, Video Editing
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Build Example Kdenlive Project for Green Screen - Upwork
item.description:
I have some video footage of a person talking in front of a green screen and I'm looking to replace the background with an orange color. I put something together on my own to crop it out, but the edges look rough and have a lot of green bleed.

I'm looking for someone to take the clip that I have and do a better job of cropping out the green screen. I have a lot of these clips to do, so I would need the .kdenlive file at the end to use as a reference for the rest of the videos.

You can find the project I have so far here:
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1g8TWPj_n2TNjgzumBSSvXHDlGmAsPwhT?usp=sharing

Let me know if you have any questions. Thanks!

Budget: $25
Posted On: June 15, 2024 12:57 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Kdenlive
Skills: Kdenlive
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Marketing Strategist - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled Video Marketing Strategist to develop a comprehensive marketing strategy for our telecom consulting website and our currently non-existing YouTube channel. As a Video Marketing Strategist, you will be responsible for creating engaging video content that resonates with our target audience and drives traffic to our website. We have access to a professional photographer/videographer but need a competitive strategy, guidance on what to shoot, and help with editing, posting.  You will also be tasked with optimizing our YouTube channel, increasing subscriber count and improving overall channel performance. Additionally, you will analyze data and provide insights to inform future video marketing campaigns. The ideal candidate must have a strong understanding of video marketing trends, excellent communication skills, and experience in creating successful video marketing campaigns.

Skills required:

- Video marketing
- Content creation
- YouTube channel optimization
- Data analysis
- Communication

Hourly Range: $10.00-$55.00
Posted On: June 15, 2024 12:42 UTC
Category: Marketing Strategy
Skills:Marketing Strategy, Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Internet Marketing
Skills: Marketing Strategy, Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Internet Marketing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Professional Video Editor | E-commerce ads - Upwork
item.description:
Video Editing Job Opportunity: Translating ads voice overs. captions, and more elements

We are looking for a detail-oriented editing professional to help us translate and adapt top-performing ads from the US and UK for another European country. This job is for someone who is dedicated and strives for perfection. Our videos are our most important asset, so we need this work to be done to the highest standards.

Responsibilities:

-Translate and adapt video ads from English to the target European language.

-Ensure translated voiceovers are perfectly timed with the text and video clips.

-Keep the original ad’s effectiveness while making it suitable for the new market.

-Work closely with our team to ensure top quality.
Qualifications:

-Fluent in English and the target European language, with excellent translation skills.

-Experience in video editing and syncing voiceovers.
Detail-oriented and committed to high-quality work.
Able to work independently and meet deadlines. Message us the word dog to see if you actually read this.

-Experience in advertising or marketing is a plus.
If you are passionate about creating high-quality localized content and are committed to excellence, we want to hear from you. Apply now and help us bring our successful ads to new audiences!

How to Apply:
Please submit a brief cover letter detailing your experience and why you are a great fit for this role. We look forward to working with someone who shares our dedication to high standards and creative excellence.

Join us and play a key role in our advertising success!

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 15, 2024 12:30 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:CapCut, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Videography, Video Production, Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe After Effects, Canva
Skills: CapCut, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Videography, Video Production, Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe After Effects, Canva
Country: Netherlands
click to apply
